name: Parasite Cell [Demo]
description:
Your task is to arrive at the Intrepid Azure and board, immediate Data & Asset Retrieval is Top Priority. The Intrepid Azure is a top-line Forward Research Ship, many Undisclosed Research Projects are ongoing on board this vessel, data retrieval for these are not required for your assignment; however, these would be a boon for Hands of Halcyon and would certainly garner a reward for any employee who is seeking to climb up the corporate ladder.

(Controls are WASD to move,  RMB to aim, LMB to shoot, Use S & D to move left and right while aiming to get a better aim! You can sprint but be careful there is a cooldown but there isn't any UI to show when the cooldown is done so be careful! Also press P to pause!)
